title: "Post-Comedy" Material and Bert Kreischer Takes Up Leather Making
description: The Bonfire welcomes back The Machine, Bert Kreischer, to the studio. Bert tells the guys that his therapist told him he needs hobbies and his decision to take up leather making and sailing. Then the crew discuss Vulture magazine's article on the new "Post-Comedy" era. Dan tries out his new tragically unfunny post-comedy material on Big Jay. Finally, Jacob gives DJ Lou a lesson on spelling pride.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
